document.heading: Health Care and Community Residence Facility, Hospice and Home Care Licensure Penalties Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-155, the “Health Care and Community Residence Facility, Hospice and Home Care Licensure Penalties Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-392, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-334 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-155 became effective on June 25, 2002.
